btnPlayGame - Variable in class com.client.ui.Instructions
 
btnPlayGameActionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.client.ui.Instructions
If player clicks Play button after the reading instructions, Instructions UI will close and player will redirect to main interface.
